variablesInstruction: The following variables are represented by icons in the text area:
customizePromptDesc: Customize how Gemini processes your content.
customizeTranslationDesc: Customize how Gemini translates your subtitles.
exampleJapanese: Add Japanese translations next to your translated text, wrapped in parentheses
templateNote: Note: The system will automatically handle the formatting and structure of the output. You only need to add your custom instructions.
customizeBackgroundPromptDesc: Customize how Gemini generates background images from lyrics and album art.
promptOneDescription: This prompt is used to generate a description from the lyrics.
promptTwoDescription: This prompt is used to generate the background image using the album art and the generated description.
lyricsVarDesc: The song lyrics (required, cannot be removed)
songNameVarDesc: The song name (required, cannot be removed)
promptVarDesc: The generated description (required, cannot be removed)
